accomplishment_honors_awards.title: INNOVATION IS-REAL ISRAEL BOOTCAMP
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Directorate of Educational Policy and Social Leadership of the Institute of Financing and Information for Education (EDUCAFIN)
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Won a scholarship from the State Government to go to Israel for the “Innovation Is-Real” program, where we attended workshops at leading regional and international research centers, including Microsoft’s Research & Development Center and the Israel Innovation Authority.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Mención Honorífica
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Reunión Internacional de Inteligencia Artificial y sus Aplicaciones (RIIAA)
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Obtuve mención honorífica en el concurso de pósters, en la categoría de "impacto social" con mi póster "Algorithmic Bias" en la RIIAA 2018.
